website_summaries.verdict: One of the most effective, efficient drip irrigation kits for challenging environments.
pros: Micro-bubbler nozzles limit the amount of wasted water while providing enough hydration to plants
Tubing lengths offer up to 250 square feet of coverage with a single kit
cons: Tubing is tough to bend around sharp turns and corners
Kinks can develop easily during installation

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself a lot of time by using a watering system.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and connected them together and they work great. I was spending my evenings pulling out the water hose and walking around watering my flower beds. This was very time consuming and it being very hot outside didn't help. The installation was a breeze and now I have this system on a timer so my flower beds are watered every morning for a few minutes. Very nice when you use this with the Orbit 56233D 3-Outlet Digital Watering Timer. This way you still have a way to use your hose without disconnecting the micro bubbler.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Garner

customer_reviews.title: Difficult Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Installation is not as easy as advertised. To puncture holes large enough to install the bubblers, etc. is extremely difficult. Once it's installed and placed in the flower beds, it works well. But getting it to that point was NOT easy!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Simple and Esthetically perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a number of Orbit devices in my lawn and garden collection of 'stuff' so I was predisposed to the company's product. The Orbit 69525 Micro Bubbler Drip Irrigation kit was incredibly easy to assemble (the directions were flawless). I had an entire raised flower bed up and running in less than an hour. The primary diver for the purchase though was the color of the spray heads. All of the other products I looked at had bright day-glow tips that would have detracted from the flowers my wife picked for the garden. As the photo shows the Orbit system is nearly invisible. For ease of installation and just great looks this system can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Koch

customer_reviews.title: Easy as duck soup
customer_reviews.text: So... I didn’t know what to expect with such mixed reviews here... but my experience was good with this product. Arrived on time, all the parts were present and in working condition, and it snapped together like LEGOS. Easy as duck soup. No leaks, no issues, no extraneous finagling. My advice to those having issues with the fittings? Make sure the hoses aren’t cold and that you have the strength and manual dexterity of at least the average 12 year old.
customer_reviews.author: jonny

customer_reviews.title: Spray heads are amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very easy kit to use, and these are the best spray heads I have ever used... amazing coverage and adjust ability. Need to buy more of these heads asap, way better than the other 5-6 types I've tried and its not even close.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A.

customer_reviews.title: Very few fittings included
customer_reviews.text: Oh my !.. you get these long hoses but you get only a small number of fittings. Not even enough to do one of my 8x4 ft veg beds. They should include 5 times that number of fittings. Now I have to go shopping for more fittings.
customer_reviews.author: lar

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: This product is super easy to assemble. I am not good at putting things together and managed this with ease in only a few minutes. The system works great!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M.

customer_reviews.title: A lot for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The kit had a lot but I did have to get additional fittings to complete the project.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D. Positano

customer_reviews.title: just that the tubing isn't flexible and kink easily.
customer_reviews.text: Works well.....just that the tubing isn't flexible and kink easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Product in good condition and as seen on Amazon .. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: ALI AL SHEHRI

customer_reviews.title: Bubblers are VERY hit-or-miss
customer_reviews.text: Half of the bubblers worked great. Half did not (and had to be replaced). In conjunction, you NEED a punch-tool to get through 1/2" tubing as you can't simply "press these in."
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Everything You Need to Set up Your Own Irrigation System—Just Add Water
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything you need to set up your own irrigation system—just add water. I just started farming on my new urban plot and I don't have money to be throwing around on crazy elaborate watering systems. I also have been changing up the location of my plants and veggies, so this customizable irrigation kit is really nice. It should be noted that while it comes with everything you need—tubes, stakes, sprinklers—there is still a fair amount of effort to get it set up. These are the raw materials and you have to put them together for it to work. It's some added effort, but it allows you to make it exactly how you want it.
customer_reviews.author: JSB Morse

customer_reviews.title: Great for repair
customer_reviews.text: This is a good item when you already have a drip irrigation system since you can use the various pieces to repair what you already have. I don't think it would be a good item if you were just starting out since there is a limited array of sprinkler heads. But I have already used it for repair. I've used drip systems for years, and the one downside is that the heads and tubing don't last that long, and they do require a fair amount of maintenance. (The worst is when earwigs get into the sprinkler heads, which happens quite frequently.) Anyway, it's a good set.
customer_reviews.author: The Writing Chef

customer_reviews.title: Convenient kit of good value and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: My wife's the gardener in the family and she gives this a 'thumbs up'. Quick to install, good quality, easy to use. She installed it all in less than a half-hour. Quality is equal to other supplies of this type we have used. Nothing really stands out, but it is convenient to purchase this as a kit. Depending on your application, you might need to buy some corner pieces as well. You may also want to consider an automated timer to go with this as one is not included.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Wendy S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, inexpensive and worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great and inexpensive way to keep your flora thriving in the summertime! We have previously used soaker hoses, but this works even better since it has the stakes and can give more of a "spray" where needed. We don't water our grass much during the summer, but our landscaping around the edges definitely needs water (roses, lavender, salvia, flowering shrubs, crepe myrtles, japanese magnolia, japanese maple)...it takes a little time to plan out and set up what you want, but after the initial setup, it's a piece of cake!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Manning

customer_reviews.title: Great on the strawberry patch
customer_reviews.text: Working great on our strawberry patch and grape vines. So, how do you water just the plants and not the yard and the weeds? This system. Easy to install and works. The primary drawback? Be ready to plant stuff the same place every year (assuming this holds up from year-to-year) because you're punching holes in the hose. I like it. I'll use it until the sun bakes the rubber hose into uselessness.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Hibbard

customer_reviews.title: Convenient all-in-one solution
customer_reviews.text: I've previously used the Rainbird system which worked well except for the flimsy drip irrigation stakes. This Orbit kit includes much sturdier irrigation stakes. Otherwise, everything else is roughly the same. Getting a kit like this is a great way to get started on irrigation. The price is fantastic for this all-in-one solution. You can always add more components later.
customer_reviews.author: Gcat

customer_reviews.title: Includes Everything I Needed
customer_reviews.text: This is so great! I've used drop systems in my garden before but I've mostly had to cobble together parts. This set has everything! And I need it as I'm redoing my garden this year (using hay bales to keep the weeds at bay) and needed to move on from my 5 year old drip parts that are frankly at the end of their life. I've got it all mapped out and am ready to install once I get the hay.
customer_reviews.author: AshertopiA

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great for getting water to plants. Got this to use in our flowerbeds. Took me a little longer than thre 15 minutes it said. I would say close to 30 to get everything set up. Fairly easy to setup though and it works great. Cover a pretty good size area. Made fairly well. Seem like it will last a little while.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Watering Setup
customer_reviews.text: This set is extremely flexible and useful. It takes a while to set it up but when you are done it is well worth it. It enables targeted watering of whatever plants you want to water in a flower or shrub bed. The materials are high quality and it is easy to setup although it takes a while. Easily recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Book Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: A Very Nice Starter System
customer_reviews.text: This Orbit Micro Bubbler drip system kit is a nice starter setup for your garden beds. We've set this up to water four garden boxes we've built in our backyard, and it covers everything nicely. Setup was easy and straightforward and the kit contains enough primary and secondary hose cover a large garden area.
customer_reviews.author: Wildness

customer_reviews.title: a nice kit but hose is stubborn
customer_reviews.text: this is a great starter kit and took care of a 16x20 bed like the set-up but struggled to get the 1/2 hose to go where I wanted and lay flat the install is quick otherwise but mildly frustrating to keep it where you want it...I might try heating the next kit to see if it helps
customer_reviews.author: So Many Tools

customer_reviews.title: Water Dripping System for your Floral and/or Vegetable Garden
customer_reviews.text: Was busy installing this drip watering system for my new Knock-Out rose bed. Kind of felt like a pretzel digging ground for rose bushes and twisting this in between. But I think it's going to be great and a time-saver for me. Would recommend for any floral or vegetable garden.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Even though there were a lot of parts this drip kit was easy to set up and get started. I'm using it in my front yard flower bed that runs along side the house. I'm not sure how long the product will hold up as the plastic doesn't seem very durable in feel or look, but only time will tell if there will be leaks or breaks. If this holds up through this time next year, I will definitely consider buying a second unit for my garden.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K. Dobbins

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit. It's super easy to use and it includes everything you might need for the installation. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: S. Templar

product_meta.title: Orbit 69525 Micro Bubbler Complete Drip Irrigation Watering Kit
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1The Orbit Micro-Bubbler Complete Drip Watering Kit helps you save water while will giving you the flexibility needed to effectively water your trees, shrubs, flowerbeds and gardens. It's designed to get you going with an easy and quick installation process that can take as little as 15 minutes to complete. Just follow these three steps: Attach the 3-in-1 faucet adapter and 1/2-inch drip tubing to your hose faucet, then lay out the 1/2-inch drip line using our best-selling 1/2-inch stakes. Next, place the micro-bubblers near your plants, punch holes in the 1/2-inch drip line, and use 1/4-inch couplings to run 1/4-inch drip lines directly to the micro-bubblers. The 3-in-1 faucet adapter is a pressure regulator, water filter and 1/2-inch tubing connector. The micro-bubblers can be used to water trees, flowerbeds and shrubs. The kit includes a 3-in-1 faucet adapter, 50 feet of 1/2-inch distribution tubing, 50 feet of 1/4-inch distribution tubing, (8) micro-bubblers on stakes, (1) 1/2-inch tee, (2) 1/2-inch end clamps, (2) 1/4-inch barb tees, (10) 1/4-inch barb couplings, (10) 1/4-inch goof plug connectors and (1) hole punch tool. This drip watering system also includes a 1/2-inch drip-lock coupling so you can easily expand your system. Use this all-in-one drip watering system to meet the watering needs of your greenery in a way that saves time, money and water.
feature_bullets: Easy to use: all-in-one drip system installs in as little as 15 minutes, so you can start watering your plants right away
Saves up to 70% more water over traditional spray heads, making your system great for saving water in drought conditions
Simple stake and micro-bubbler placement allows for direct watering of your plants, not landscape or weeds
Flexible tubing allows for easy and worry-free installation around trees, shrubs, flowerbeds and other existing landscaping features in your yard
Covers up to 250 square feet, allowing you to set up a drip system that will meet the needs of your flowerbeds, potted plants and gardens

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars78 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
